spell_mana_drain.name: Mana Drain
spell_mana_drain.full damage: Every spell cast by the target costs 1 extra MP and you gain 1 MP

spell_rock_armor.name: Rock Armor
spell_rock_armor.full damage: Gain an Armor Rating equal to you Magic for 1-6 hours (depending on MP spent)

spell_daze.name: Daze
spell_daze.full damage: As above and taget can not take any actions for 1 turn
spell_daze.half damage: Target suffers -1 penalty to all ability tests for 1 turn

spell_winters_grasp.name: Winters Grasp
spell_winters_grasp.full damage: 1d6 (pen) on cast, each round if test is failed target takes 1d6 (pen) and -2 to Speed for rounds equal to your Magic

spell_weakness.name: Weakness
spell_weakness.full damage: As above and -1 to Strength and Dexterity
spell_weakness.half damage: Target suffers -5 to Speed for a number of rounds equal to Dragon Die

spell_heal.name: Heal
spell_heal.full damage: Heal target 1d6 for every point of mana spent

spell_spell_shield.name: Spell Shield
spell_spell_shield.full damage: Lasts number of rounds equal to your Magic, any spell cast on you has no effect, but you must pay MP equal to that spells cost

spell_walking_bomb.name: Walking Bomb
spell_walking_bomb.full damage: 1d6+1 (pen) on cast and an additional 1d6+1 (pen) each round the test is failed
spell_walking_bomb.AoE: If spell kills target, anyone within 4 yards takes 2d6 damage

spell_spell_wisp.name: Spell Wisp
spell_spell_wisp.full damage: You summon a wisp that gives you +1 to Spellpower for 1 hr.

spell_drain_life.name: Drain Life
spell_drain_life.full damage: Target takes 1d6+Magic (pen) damage, you heal that amount
spell_drain_life.half damage: Target takes 1d6 (pen) damage, you heal that amount

spell_heroic_offense.name: Heroic Offense
spell_heroic_offense.full damage: One ally gains +1 to Strength for rest of encounter

spell_glyph_of_paralysis.name: Glyph of Paralysis
spell_glyph_of_paralysis.full damage: paralyzed for 1d3 rounds, defense set to 7

spell_vulnerability_hex.name: Vulnerability Hex
spell_vulnerability_hex.full damage: As above and -2 on test vs. Spellpower until end of encounter
spell_vulnerability_hex.half damage: Target suffers -1 to Defense until end of encounter

spell_mind_blast.name: Mind Blast
spell_mind_blast.full damage: All knocked prone and can't take a major action next turn in 2 yard radius. Prepared actions lost.
spell_mind_blast.half damage: Just knocked prone. Prepared actions lost.
